Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DC2 (MIC=6 µM), Escherichia coli K12 (MIC=15 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activiy against the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli.

Literature.Title: Structure, dynamics, and antimicrobial and immune modulatory activities of human LL-23 and its single-residue variants mutated on the basis of homologous primate cathelicidins.
Literature.Author: Wang G, Elliott M, Cogen AL, Ezell EL, Gallo RL, Hancock RE.
